docs.title: Exercises
docs.description: The goal is to explain Kubernetes and Docker Swarm topics in a practical way, like storage, deployments, services etc and provide exercises scenarios for everyone to follow along.

docs.title: Kubernetes Services
docs.description: This blog is a little bit longer than other parts of Kubernetes explained deep enough. Kubernetes networking is a very complex topic and trying to write about all nuances of different services and mechanisms would probably take a few blogs on it's own. Instead we will focus on specific areas of Kubernetes Networking: services and look at their practical applications.
